content.text:
# 2024 Empire Women's Indoor 2

Suzan Lamens
| champd =  Isabelle Haverlag /  Anna Rogers
| main_name = Empire Women's Indoor
}}
The '''2024 Empire Women's Indoor 2''' was a professional tennis tournament played on indoor hard courts. It was the seventeenth edition of the tournament, which was part of the 2024 ITF Women's World Tennis Tour. It took place in Trnava, Slovakia, between 4 and 10 March 2024.
Champions
Singles
*  Suzan Lamens def.  Céline Naef, 6–2, 6–2
Doubles
*  Isabelle Haverlag /  Anna Rogers def.  Liang En-shuo /  Tang Qianhui, 6–3, 4–6, [12–10]

* Rankings are as of 26 February 2024.
Other entrants
The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw:
*  Renáta Jamrichová
*  Kristina Mladenovic
*  Sára Šarinová
*  Amélie Šmejkalová
The following players received entry from the qualifying draw:
*  Alex Eala
*  Veronika Erjavec
*  Lucie Havlíčková
*  Francisca Jorge
*  Suzan Lamens
*  Tatiana Prozorova
*  Antonia Ružić
*  Anastasia Tikhonova
The following player received entry as a lucky loser:
*  Valentina Ryser
